CustomField.description: If the call was passed on to an external PSTN number, the number will be shown here.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This will be the phone number of the person that answered the call (This may well be different to CalledNumber, depending on call dialplan routing). If the call recipient was a Natterbox user, this will show their 4 digit extension number.
CustomField.label: ConnectedNumber
